Posts.Content: Nov 16, 2017 02:31PM pamelakp wrote: gb2115 and moderators, thank so much. I'm at home now and am a bit sore. Resting. The people at Hill Breast Center at MD Anderson here in Jacksonville, FL were absolutely the best. Everyone was so nice.

Posts.Content: pamelakp wrote: I'm here in the breast center waiting to have biopsy. I want to throw up. I'm not worried about the procedure, but about what they will tell me. Dx 10/26/2017, DCIS, Right, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, ER-/PR- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I'm here in the breast center waiting to have biopsy. pamelakp pamelakp

Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2017 11:14AM - edited Nov 17, 2017 11:16AM by pamelakp The radiologist was a lovely woman. She said it looks good and is localized in a good spot. She said if it's benign they will watch it closely, if it not benign, they take it out, and that's that. She said it was about 2 cm.
